author: Daniel4lm
name: Glass-shell Cinnamon theme
description:
This is relatively light and transparent theme. This theme requires Cinnamon shell (> = 1.6). 

Installations instructions: Unpack the theme in ~ /.themes folder and activate it inside Themes sections under Cinnamon System Settings tool.

Note: Now compatible with Cinnamon ver. 1.6.x/1.8.x

This version of the theme is updated with new themes for Cinnamon desklet CobiAnalogClock 1.2. These themes are in the Analog Clock themes / folder inside this archive.

Under GPL
